definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
diaphysis (long segment of a bone)/fig. backbone
what are you doing?/what's he up to?
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?

sentences.english: I am tired of hunting the same old coon.
sentences.chinese: 反覆幹同樣的事，我真幹膩了。

sentences.english: Pablo must have a sound plan or he would not have tried it.
sentences.chinese: 巴勃羅一定有個行得通的方案，否則他不會這麼幹。

sentences.english: We want someone for the job who has lots of pizzazz .
sentences.chinese: 我們想要有生氣的人幹這項工作。

sentences.english: I bought a loaf of bread at the baker's.
sentences.chinese: 這麪包幹了，我得去同麪包師說一說。

sentences.english: When I was doing the housework, my husband telephoned me from the office.
sentences.chinese: 當我正在幹家務時，我丈夫從辦公室打電話給我。

sentences.english: Only humping yourself can you hope to finish your work in time.
sentences.chinese: 只有加把勁幹，你纔有希望按時完成任務。

sentences.english: Global warming caused a dryer and warmer climate in the centeral part of Qinghai-Tibet plateau.
sentences.chinese: 受全球變暖影響，青藏高原氣候呈現出暖幹趨勢。

sentences.english: He went about the job like a bull in a china shop.
sentences.chinese: 他幹這種活就想公牛進了瓷器店那樣莽撞。

sentences.english: In the end, the workers became used to doing hard work.
sentences.chinese: 最後，工人們終於習慣於幹苦活了。

sentences.english: Sub-cellar housing the ancient halls are dry and wet courtyard patio.
sentences.chinese: 古窨子屋堂內有幹天井和溼天井。

sentences.english: It was a very interesting project. I really enjoyed working on it.
sentences.chinese: 這個項目很有意思，我很喜歡幹。

sentences.english: X-ray examination showed a permeated destruction in the metaphysis of the bone.
sentences.chinese: 線片顯示長骨幹骺端不規則低密度影。

sentences.english: He's a little kiss-ass bastard who'll do anything to get ahead.
sentences.chinese: 那個小混蛋是個馬屁精，只要能往上爬，他啥事都幹。

sentences.english: On Wednesday, it was a sampler. She says the stripling's fun.
sentences.chinese: 一個星期三場音樂會真是有點拼命幹，對不對？

sentences.english: If you want the job, you must be prepared to take a drop in salary.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想幹這份工作就必須願意少拿薪水。

sentences.english: The main transportation sand stone material, evening does, best leaves Pan Lijin.
sentences.chinese: 主要運輸沙石料，晚上幹，最好離潘裏近的。

definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
to think (i.e. to take it to be true that ...) (Usually there is an implication that the notion is mistaken – except when expressing one's own current opinion.)
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
